Feb. 21, 1981 D North West Brass Band Association Youth Contest
North West Brass Band Association Youth Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
north-west-brass-band-association-youth-contest
None
Imperial Hotel, Blackpool, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £600, 2nd £450, 3rd £ 150, 4th £100. 6th annual contest promoted by Imperial Hotel, Blackpool. 9 bands competed.
June 4, 2014, 2:15 p.m. March 23, 2017, 4:26 p.m.
